text: The Marcel coal mine is a large mine in the south of Poland in Radlin near Wodzisław Śląski, Silesian Voivodeship, 260 km south-west of the capital, Warsaw. Until 1949 it was called "Emma". In 1995 KWK Marcel was connected with 1 Maja Coal Mine. Having estimated reserves of 76 million tonnes of coal near Marklowice and Wodzisław Śląski. The annual coal production is around 2.75 million tonnes. == See also == * 1 Maja Coal Mine == External links == * Official site Category:Coal mines in Poland Category:Wodzisław County Category:Coal mines in Silesian Voivodeship
title: Marcel Coal Mine
